title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing longing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing longing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There is no doubt that longing in a dream is one of the visions that is considered common to many and is not strange. In addition, this vision includes many meanings, signs, and symbols that differ in it. Based on the condition of the dreamer, and the details that appear in the dream, and in this context, we will inform you of the interpretation of the dream of seeing longing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing longing in a dream by Ibn SirinSince the scholar Ibn Sirin presented many of these interpretations, and the meanings and connotations that these visions contain, especially seeing Longing, especially since it is repeated by many people, and here we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing longing in a dream by Ibn Sirin as well: This dream, as narrated by the scholar Ibn Sirin, indicates hearing good news, good luck, and the fulfillment of desires. In addition, seeing longing in a dream is a result For psychological problems, loneliness and stress. Also, if one sees in his dream that he is longing for a specific person. This vision is a sign that I hear good news especially for this person and it brings me happiness. Also, seeing longing and crying in a dream is a sign of relief from fears and pains. And wealth after poverty. It also indicates recovery from illness and the fulfillment of ambitions and desires. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing longing in a dream for a single woman. Longing in a dream is one of the dreams that has many different connotations between positive and other negative connotations, and their differences. Based on what is seen in the dream, and along these lines we will learn more about it. The interpretation of the dream of seeing longing in a dream for a single woman is also: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is missing her childhood. It indicates that she is going through a period of nervousness and a bad psychological state. Whereas if she sees that she is missing her lover The ex in a dream. It is evidence of remorse and psychological pain. Also, seeing longing for a specific place in a dream is a sign of nostalgia for past memories and carries a beautiful meaning in it. But longing for a specific person in a dream is evidence of one-sided love and may not be reciprocated. On the same feelings. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing parsley in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of longing for the dead. It is one of the recurring dreams of many people, especially those who have lost their families or loved ones, and are interested in learning about the meanings and signs that these dreams contain, especially since they differ between positive and negative, and here let me The interpretation of the dream of longing for the dead is also explained: If one sees in a dream that he is longing for a dead person. This vision is a sign that the end of the vision is approaching. In addition, if one sees in a dream that he is longing for the dead. It is evidence of a feeling of love and support from all people from Around him. In addition to longing for a dead person in a dream. It is evidence of how close the dreamer is to God and his great interest in performing acts of worship. But if a person sees in a dream that he misses his mother and embraces her in a dream. This is evidence that he will obtain many good things and will be able to achieve Whatever he wants

title: Interpretation of a dream about having sex with his uncle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with an uncle in a dream. Dear reader, you ask about the interpretation of a dream about intercourse with an uncle in a dream. Below we learn about the interpretations of scholars, all of this and more details. Interpretation of a dream about having sex with an uncle in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about having sex with an uncle in a dream can be A dream is evidence of common interests, and God knows all that is not seen. If an unmarried girl sees her uncle, this may lead to goodness and happiness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees sexual intercourse with a dead uncle in a dream, this may be a sign of longing for him, and God has all knowledge. When a married woman sees sexual intercourse With her uncle in a dream, this can lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with an uncle’s wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with an uncle’s wife in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing your uncle’s wife pregnant in a dream could be a sign of goodness, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees her uncle’s wife pregnant in a dream, this may lead to good news, and God knows the unseen. When you see your uncle’s wife in a dream This may represent the stability and preservation of the kinship connection, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about contacting a stepmother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about contacting a stepmother in a dream can indicate a strong relationship with the stepmother, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees sleeping with the stepmother in a dream, it can express deception. Cunning on the part of the stepmother, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees himself playing with his stepmother in a dream, this may be evidence of strengthening his relationship with his stepmother, and God knows best. If an unmarried young man sees himself in a dream sleeping with his stepmother, this may express The deception that he is subjected to by his stepmother, and God knows all that he did not see.I dreamed that I was in contact with my fiancée in a dream in a dreamI dreamed that I was in contact with my fiancée in a dream. In a dream, we did not find specific interpretations of seeing this. However, seeing a preacher in a dream could be a sign of goodness and benevolence, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream public intercourse with her fiancé, she may express some unpleasant things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a girl sees An unmarried woman whose fiancé socializes socially and is happy could lead to mistakes he commits and agrees with her, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I had sex with two women in a dream. I dreamed that I had sex with two women in a dream. It may indicate committing sins and disobedience, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees two women having intercourse in a dream, it may express the sins he is committing, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees two women having intercourse in a dream, this may indicate his desire to get married, and God knows best. When an unmarried young man sees In a dream, he has intercourse with two women, this can lead to his desires, and God knows all that he does not see. Interpretation of a dream about adultery with an aunt in a dream Interpretation of a dream about adultery with an aunt in a dream Seeing intercourse with an aunt can indicate trouble, and God knows all that

title: Interpretation of seeing a gift of perfume in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A gift of perfume in a dream: Perfume is one of the beautiful gifts that is exchanged between people, and if you find someone who gives you perfume and you love him, you feel happy and expect him to appreciate you and look for your happiness a lot, and sometimes a girl finds a life partner who gives her perfume in the vision. Or is there no good things in it? The next day we will explain the most important interpretations of the gift of perfume in a dream. A gift of perfume in a dream. The dream interpretation of a perfume gift has acceptable and beautiful signs. According to experts, they explain the happiness that comes to the one who received it as well as if it smells nice. If the dreamer was happy when he received the perfume because it smells nice And subtle, it means the success that he will soon achieve at work or in his education, while if he is then surprised by an unpleasant and annoying smell, it is likely that the person who gave it does not value you or love you and is always ready to disturb you and belittle you. Giving perfume to Ibn Sirin’s dream confirms the scholar Ibn Sirin. That there are separate matters that the dream of a gift of perfume clarifies and says that it is happy news about marriage if the young man or girl thinks about it or has a relationship, especially if the other party finds a beautiful bottle of perfume and using it the meaning is to emphasize love and fidelity in their relationship. If the seeker finds someone who gives him a bottle of perfume, The dream interprets that he will be superior because he has a strong focus and seeks to achieve power and make his family happy. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds on the secret dream interpretation site from Google. Giving scent to a single woman’s dream Giving perfume to a girl in a dream confirms that she will have a calm and beautiful relationship with the other if he is her fiancé , with its pleasant scent that is always with her. However, if a girl buys perfume and gives it to a member of her family, this may reflect the presence of a happy occasion for that family or that particular person, and sometimes she is close to him and wishes him well. He gives her perfume and she does not like it, so he proposes to her, but she does not just care about this matter and does not feel love towards him. Giving perfume in a dream to a married womanBy giving perfume to a married woman in a dream and her beautiful scent and scent and her feeling of freshness and comfort, we can say that her social relationships are very successful and people appreciate her because of her good morals and kindness. . She will most likely obtain sufficient benefits and sources of livelihood if she sees someone giving her perfume in a dream. Jurists focus on the fact that the gift of perfume to a married woman by the husband is good evidence of pregnancy, which happens in the last days, as this woman obtains the offspring she desires from God Almighty. And the best of them is the one who makes them. She is happy and always makes her calm and does not get upset or disturbed, and if she disagrees with the man and sees that he is giving her a scent, then this matter will be resolved sooner and the sadness will end. Giving perfume in a dream to a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about giving perfume to a pregnant woman is a distinctive sign by using it and putting it on her clothes, as the dream interprets that she is calm. She is trying to remove the stress and fear of childbirth from her, and she hopes that she will enjoy good health and never see evil for herself or her child, God willing.

title: Interpretation of how to distinguish between a dream and a vision

preview.html: How to tell a dream from a vision from the website Moments People often wonder about the difference between a dream and a vision, and the truth is that there is a clear difference between them despite the fact that both a dream and a vision have the same thing in common what happens to a person in his sleep, and the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, He explained and recognized the difference between them when he said that a dream is from Satan and a vision is from God Almighty, and it could be about dreams, as happened to the king of Egypt when he dreamed of seven fat cows being eaten by seven slaves. How do you differentiate between a dream and a vision? And seven green thorns and some of them withered, so he got up in fear from his sleep and consulted. Those in charge of the matter explained to him that perhaps this was a dream, and if that was not the case, then we did not deserve it. To interpret this, the king’s servant who was with our master Joseph stood in prison and remembered that at that time, our master Joseph was a researcher in the interpretation of dreams and he explained to him his dream that the king would become watery one day and he said to the king: I will guide you to someone who will interpret it for you. So they went to our master Joseph, peace be upon him, to explain his vision to the king and reveal his secret with insight and knowledge from God Almighty, and the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, was explaining it to him. Dreams and visions, and he loved to listen to the dreams and dreams of the Companions, and among the visions that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, saw was our master Omar bin Al-Khattab, who was wearing a shirt dragging him. Dreams are based on the Qur’an and Sunnah, including Ibn Sirin in his book Interpretation of Dreams and Visions. As for a good dream, which is as the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: It is from God Almighty and that it is out of forty-six parts of prophecy, it is good news, Glory be to Him. God Almighty said: For them there is good news in this world and the hereafter, so there is no change in the words of God, for this is the great victory).

title: Interpretation of a dream about a gun by Ibn Sirin and its most important meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about weapons by Ibn Sirin in a dream and its most important meanings. Interpreting dreams is a science that is not available to those who are familiar with Islamic law and its teachings and have memorized the Sunnah of the Prophet and the Holy Qur’an so that they can interpret dreams in the correct and accurate manner. From the person who sees and interprets dreams in the correct way for them, and through our article we will convey the interpretation of a dream about a weapon to Ibn Sirin, as we will convey all the interpretations related to this vision to Ibn Sirin specifically, which entered the dictionary of dream interpretations for interpretive scholars, and we will also mention the interpretation of a dream about a gun for a married woman. And divorced. And other matters related to seeing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about weapons by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a weapon in a dream is one of the dreams that has many meanings and interpretations mentioned by interpretation scholars, especially the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing a gun symbolizes the dreamer, depending on the details of the vision and his condition. Seeing a gun in a dream indicates the death of the dreamer’s worries and problems in his life. Interpretation of a dream about weapons by Ibn Sirin. See also: Earrings of gold. Interpretation of a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a gun in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned many interpretations of seeing a gun in a dream, as Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of this differed. The dream varies from person to person, in addition to the details of the dream and the condition of the dreamer. Seeing someone killing himself with a gun in a dream shows the dreamer’s weakness and inability to solve his problems in life. If someone sees in a dream a group of men carrying weapons, this indicates the dreamer’s fear of Theft. Also, seeing suicide with a gun shows a lot of thinking about the future. See also: Interpretation of a dream about having a hole in the ear in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream. Seeing a gun in a dream shows many connotations and interpretations mentioned by interpretation scholars, and seeing a gun is one of the visions. Which has positive and negative symbols for the pioneer, which we will explain according to the vision and details in the dream. Here are the most important interpretations that have emerged about the vision: Seeing a gun in a dream indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and problems in his life. Seeing a gun for a man in a dream symbolizes that he will achieve great profits and gains. A vision. A gun for a pregnant woman in a dream symbolizes the birth of a male child. If a single woman sees in a dream that she is using weapons to get rid of thieves, this indicates victory. Also, seeing the dreamer killing himself with a gun indicates the weakness of his character and his inability to solve problems. Seeing a gun in a dream Being able to carry it and use it is a sign of the fulfillment of the dreamer’s ambitions. See also: Interpretation of dreams about worms that come out of the mouth in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and its most important indications. Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream for a married woman. After we mention in general the interpretations related to seeing a gun in a dream for a fortune teller, we will mention during our topic the interpretation of a dream A married woman with a gun in a dream. We will mention the most important interpretations that came in the dream, the context of this vision, and what are the connotations and meanings of seeing a married woman in her dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about purple in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of the dream of molokhiya in detail in Al-Osaimi’s dream, as many people want to know more about the connotations and symbols that this dream refers to, especially since molokhiya is considered a green leafy vegetable more than what many people prefer, and it will do so. Explain today through the details of our item. Interpretation of a dream about hibiscus for men and women. Interpretation of a dream about purple in a dream of Al-Asamit. Interpretation of dreams: Molokhia in a dream. It indicates happiness and good news. The dream of collecting molokhiya leaves is evidence of profit from the profession in which the dreamer works. Eating molokhia in a dream indicates that some changes will occur in the life of The dreamer. Yellow molokhiya in a dream indicates anxiety and problems. Interpretation of a dream about molokhiya in a single woman’s dream. Buying molokhiya in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy, especially if it is green. Food Molokhiya in a dream is a sign of commitment to the near future. A dream of an unmarried girl seeing dried mallow in a dream, This indicates her marriage to a young man who suits her. Interpretation of a dream about molokhiya in a married woman’s dream. Molokhiya in a married woman’s dream is considered evidence of the happy married life she lives. A dream about molokhiya also indicates good offspring. Eating molokhiya also indicates providing a male child. Interpretation of a dream about molokhiya in a dream Pregnant woman: Molochia in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease of childbirth. Seeing molokhia in a dream is evidence of a girl’s diet. Dreaming of molokhia leaves is an indication of nourishing a male child. Molochia is generally considered in a pregnant woman’s dream to be evidence of good events. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing prickly pear in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing prickly figs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and prickly figs in a dream indicate wealth, wealth, and good acquisition, as eating prickly figs means hearing happy news and a person seeing thorns. With a difficult mood, and in the interpretation of dreams, there is always a difference in the interpretation of dreams by scholars such as the scholar Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen, and we will explain this in some detail in the interpretation of dreams. Dream of seeing prickly pears in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Seeing prickly pears in a dream means abundance of food, abundance of kindness, blessing with money, diligence, and hearing good news. Interpretation of a dream about prickly pears by Ibn Sirin: The interpretation of prickly pears in a dream as interpreted by the great scholar Ibn Sirin indicates Until the dreamer obtained money and good abundance in his life. Seeing the tragic injuries sustained by the pioneer is evidence of the livelihood that the dreamer will obtain and will be the reason for his happiness in life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing figs in a dream. Interpretation of Nabulsi’s vision of prickly pear: Figs Prickly pears in a dream are evidence of profit and growth in one’s life. Seeing prickly pears in a dream symbolizes a person who is rich and useful to others. Seeing thorns in prickly pear fruits is evidence that a person is suffering from a difficult mood and also indicates the spread of heresies and magic. Seeing figs in a dream is A warning message to the pioneer to think carefully when making decisions and symbolizes the dreamer’s adventure and danger. Interpretation of a dream about prickly pear for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing prickly pear in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the approaching date of her marriage, and he is a person with good morals. Seeing prickly pear in a girl’s dream It symbolizes the death of sorrows and stress, and you will get rid of them as quickly as possible. The interpretation of eating prickly pears in a girl’s dream indicates that she will be happy in her life. Prickly pears in a girl’s dream is an indication that she will be able to achieve her goals and ambitions in life. Continue also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sycamores in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about prickly pear for a married woman: Seeing prickly pears in a dream for a married woman is good news for her. Prickly pears in a dream for a married woman is a sign of her good luck and the stability of her married life. The interpretation of seeing prickly pears appears The prickly pear in a married woman’s dream is the blessing that she will receive in her life. The prickly pear in a married woman’s dream is a sign of good health. Eating prickly pear in a dream for a married woman is a good sign for her and her family. The interpretation of a dream about prickly pear in a married woman’s dream is evidence of many Good things. Interpretation of a dream about prickly pear for a pregnant woman: Interpretation of a dream about prickly pear in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the birth of a healthy child. Therefore, seeing prickly pear in a dream means an easy birth. Interpretation of a dream about prickly pear for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of her freedom from the problems of pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing prickly pears in a dream does not mean...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a strange man in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a strange man The girl who dominates her thinking is meeting the knight of her dreams and marrying him and forming a happy and stable family, and when she sees that she is marrying a stranger in a dream, she is curious to know what the interpretation is and what brings her good and joy and expects us to bleed her good? Or is it evil, so she seeks refuge from this dream and prays to God to spare her from its evil? All this we will learn in this article, through a large number of cases related to this symbol, as well as from the opinions and sayings of the great scholars and interpreters in the world of dreams, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a strange man The vision of a girl marrying a strange man in a dream carries many indications and connotations that can be recognized in the following cases: An unmarried girl who dreams of marrying a strange man indicates that she will soon marry a good man with whom she will live a happy life. If a girl dreams that she is marrying a stranger she does not know, this symbolizes her good condition and her haste to do good and help others. A girl marrying a strange man in a dream indicates a lot of sustenance and money that she will get in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a strange man by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin has discussed the interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying a strange man in a dream due to its frequent repetition, and the following are some of the interpretations that came to him: Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of a girl marrying a strange man in a dream as evidence that she will get a job opportunity abroad from which she will earn a lot of legitimate money and achieve great success. If an unmarried girl dreams of marrying a strange man, for her success And her superiority over her peers on the scientific and practical level. A girl’s marriage to a man she does not know in a dream is considered a sign of her good luck and the success that will accompany her in life. Interpretation of a dream of a girl’s marriage to someone she loves If a girl sees in a dream that she is marrying the person she loves, this symbolizes her love for him and their strong relationship that will be exhausted by marriage in reality. A girl who sees in her dream that she is marrying her lover is an indication of the psychological state she is living in and her desire for this to happen, which is reflected in her dreams. Interpretation of a dream of a girl’s marriage to a married man If a girl dreams that she is marrying a married man, this symbolizes that she is in a relationship with a person who is not suitable for her and she must stay away from him to avoid trouble. A girl who sees in a dream that she is entering into a marriage with a married man is a sign that she has committed some actions and mistakes that have involved her in many calamities and she must give them up and get closer to God to correct her situation. Interpretation of a dream of a girl’s marriage to an old man If a girl dreams that she is marrying an old man, this symbolizes delaying her marriage and stopping it for a period, and she must pray to God to grant her a righteous husband. An unmarried girl who sees in Her dream that he marries her in old age indicates that she will be associated in the future with a mature and sober person. A girl’s marriage to an old man in a dream indicates the stability of her life on the emotional and psychological level. Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying her father

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a little girl giving birth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a little girl giving birth in a dream: The interpretation varies depending on the condition of the child whom the dreamer saw in the dream. Children are loved by God and are known for their innocence, honesty, purity and peace. Children are one of God's blessings to man. In this article, we learn about the interpretation of this vision. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of the girl who was born in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a little girl who was born in a dream. It is mentioned in the book of interpretation by Ibn Sirin that seeing a beautiful girl in a dream indicates a feeling of joy and happiness for this person wherever he is. However, if the girl sees her body thin and ugly, wearing old, dirty and torn clothes, this indicates the presence of problems and troubles that will happen to her. Interpretation of seeing a young girl in a single man’s dream If an unmarried woman sees a young girl in a dream, this indicates many clues. If he sees the girl She is young, her body is thin, her clothes are dirty and torn, and her appearance is not beautiful. This indicates that the girl feels sad about a certain matter or that she is facing problems and difficulties in her life. And God Almighty knows best. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a girl giving birth in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a girl giving birth in a dream, and this girl was beautiful and clean, and her clothes were beautiful, indicates good news. If it is otherwise, this indicates happiness and livelihood that she will obtain. She and her family, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a little girl in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream in general means that she will have a natural and blessed birth on the specified date, God willing. If this pregnant woman is in her first months and does not know the sex of the fetus, this indicates that she will give birth. A male, God willing, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a little girl in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a newborn baby in a dream varies, depending on whether it is an infant, a newborn, or a boy. If a man sees in his dream a baby girl or a newborn, This is good news of the abundance and abundance of goodness, and that he has a lot of money. If he is a student or is still studying and sees his son, infant, or newborn, this indicates his superiority and success, God willing. If the dreamer of the vision is a merchant, farmer, or peasant and sees his newly born daughter in his dream This is good for him because his production will be abundant and he will earn a lot. If the dreamer is a woman and a girl who dreams of a baby or a baby, then this indicates good luck and that the members of her house feel friendly, intimate and respectful of each other. If she is single, tell her about marriage or that there will be an engagement or Engagement. If the woman is married, she is pregnant or the baby is male and she enjoys happiness and blessings in her life. Read also: Pumpkin in a dream. Interpretation of a child crying in a dream. Seeing a child crying indicates the death of a person loved and dear to the dreamer. It also means that this dreamer is in debt. Seeing a child in dirty clothes It means that there are problems, sorrow, and problems with the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a little girl in a man’s dream. If a man sees a little girl in his dream, this indicates wealth and many good things. If he sees bitterness,

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate chip cookies in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing yourself eating chocolate chip cookies in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing baking cookies with chocolate indicates committing sins and disobedience for the coming period and not repenting and returning to God Almighty. A married woman in a dream may indicate that she is eating chocolate chip cookies, and this is a sign of positive actions that she will take in the days NextThe chocolate cookie shows people’s control in the coming period over the fortuneteller and he will control people in an unbearable way. Seeing yourself distributing chocolate in a dream is a sign of excellence and success in scientific and practical life, as well as excellence at work, and God knows best. Interpretation of eating chocolate chips in a dream for a woman Single woman: If an unmarried girl sees that she is buying chocolate biscuits, this indicates her close marriage with the person she loves. Also, seeing baking chocolate with biscuits in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her success in her work and her wonderful distinction in her life. Also, seeing biscuits being removed in an unmarried girl’s dream If a married woman dreams that she is making chocolate chip cookies, then this vision shows her intense love for her husband. Also, seeing chocolate chip cookies in the trash indicates differences and sorrows that A married woman sees it in her life. Also, if a married woman sees herself buying chocolate biscuits, this indicates abundant nutrition and good deeds. Perhaps eating chocolate biscuits in a dream indicates happy occasions and joys that will occur in the family. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate biscuits for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees In her dream, she says all chocolate cookies, this vision indicates that the fetus will be healthy. Also, seeing chocolate bread with biscuits in a woman’s dream indicates the ease of her pregnancy and the closeness of her due date, and God knows best. To dream of a pregnant woman taking cookies With chocolate indicates many quarrels and sins that you will commit. Interpretation of seeing a man eating chocolate chip cookies in a dream: He ate chocolate chip cookies. This vision shows his imminent marriage and he will eat an unlimited number of chocolates at his wedding. Also, seeing a married man buying cookies indicates his emotional relationship with his wife and obedience. His wife follows his orders. Also, the dream of biscuits in a sweet person’s dream indicates an improvement in his relationship with his Lord in the coming days, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.
